mapper.insert: insert into db_matecategory (SID, CATEGROYID, CATEGROYNAME, EBAYCATEGORYID, EBAYCATEGORYNAME, TEMPLETID, FLAG, SITE) values (#{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{categroyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categroyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebaycategoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebaycategoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templetid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_matecategory set CATEGROYID = #{categroyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGROYNAME = #{categroyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EBAYCATEGORYID = #{ebaycategoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EBAYCATEGORYNAME = #{ebaycategoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPLETID = #{templetid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SITE = #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SID, CATEGROYID, CATEGROYNAME, EBAYCATEGORYID, EBAYCATEGORYNAME, TEMPLETID, FLAG, SITE from db_matecategory where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SID, CATEGROYID, CATEGROYNAME, EBAYCATEGORYID, EBAYCATEGORYNAME, TEMPLETID, FLAG, SITE from db_matecategory
